00013 namespace Tripi
00014 {
00015     public partial class GpsForm : UIForm
00016     {
00017         private const string noSatellitesString = "Satellites are currently not available";
00018 
00019         public GpsForm()
00020         {
00021             InitializeComponent();
00022             InitializeGPS();
00023         }
00024 
00025         private void InitializeGPS()
00026         {
00027             GPSListener gpsListener = GPSListener.GetInstance;
00028             gpsListener.OnLocationChanged += new Action<GpsPosition>(GpsLocationChanged);
00029             gpsListener.OpenGPS();
00030         }
00031 
00032         private void GpsLocationChanged(GpsPosition position)
00033         {
00034             if (this.InvokeRequired)
00035             {
00036                 Invoke(new Action<GpsPosition>(GpsLocationChanged), position);
00037                 return;
00038             }
00039 
00040             if (position != null)
00041             {
00042                 tboxLatitude.Text = position.LatitudeValid ?
00043                     position.LatitudeInDegreesMinutesSeconds.ToString() : "";
00044 
00045                 tboxLongitude.Text = position.LongitudeValid ?
00046                     position.LongitudeInDegreesMinutesSeconds.ToString() : "";
00047 
00048                 tboxSpeed.Text = position.SpeedValid ?
00049                     position.Speed.ToString() : "";
00050 
00051                 if (!position.SatellitesInSolutionValid ||
00052                     !position.SatellitesInViewValid ||
00053                     !position.SatelliteCountValid || position.SatelliteCount == 0)
00054                 {
00055                     labelSatellite.Text = noSatellitesString;
00056                 }
00057                 else
00058                 {
00059                     labelSatellite.Text = "";
00060                 }
00061             }
00062         }
00063 
00064         private void CloseGPS()
00065         {
00066             GPSListener gpsListener = GPSListener.GetInstance;
00067             gpsListener.OnLocationChanged -= new Action<GpsPosition>(GpsLocationChanged);
00068             gpsListener.CloseGPS();
00069         }
00070 
00071         private void BackButtonClick(object sender, EventArgs e)
00072         {
00073             CloseGPS();
00074             this.DialogResult = DialogResult.Cancel;
00075             this.Close();
00076         }
00077 
00078         private void FormLoad(object sender, EventArgs e)
00079         {
00080             this.MenuBar.LeftMenu = "Back";
00081             this.MenuBar.LeftMenuClicked += new EventHandler(BackButtonClick);
00082         }
00083     }
